Navigation

Concepts for the navigation are inspired by the following sites:

  • rackspace.com
  • developer.rackspace.com

Ceiling Navigation

If present, this element should be the top most element on a web page.

It is recommended to use a combination of links with labels as well as button drop downs.

WIPMenu Links

Various combinations on achieving links with labels within the ceiling navigation.
